cave_mouth: ^You are an archaeologist. You are at the enterance to a recently discovored cave.

b: ^There is a torch on the floor.

cave_mouth: ^ The cave extends to the east and west.
east_tunnel: ^You are in the east tunnel. It is very dark, you can't see anything.

b: ^ After relighting your torch, you see once again

west_tunnel: ^ A few steps into the tunnel there is a hole

b: ^ with a ladder leading down. It's too dark to see what's at the bottom.
^, the burning remains of a ladder iluminate that there is a larger room at the bottom, however the drop is too far jump to saftly jump.

west_tunnel: ^Extinguish Torch and Take The Ladder Down

b: ^Light the Tourch and Drop It Down The Hole

torch_pickup: ^You now have a torch. May it light the way.
east_tunnel_lit: ^While in the east tunnel, you watch as the light of your torch glints off the thousands of coins in the room.
coin_pickup: ^You examin the coin in your hand. It is seemingly made of solid gold, with the figure of a skull imprinted on it.
no_ladder: ^As the torch falls down the shaft it nicks the ladder, causing it to catch fire.
west_cavern: ^You reach to bottom of the ladder, placing your feet on solid ground. But it is far too dark to see anything.
death: ^You slam onto the cavern's floor breaking both of your legs instantly. As you bleed out, the burning ladder falls onto your head, scorching you as the world fades to black.
lit_cavern: ^With a lit torch you can now see a sprawling covern before you with a figure sitting in the middle of the chamber.
^Extinguish Torch and Go Back Up The Ladder
cavern_center_death: ^As you aproch the figure, you realize that it is a skeleton sitting on a throne. Faster than you can react, the skeleton animates, pulling a sword that it promptly uses to skewer you. As you bleed out, in immense pain, you watch as the skeleton procedes to take the gold coin from your pocket; then sit back on its throne.
cavern_center: ^As you aproch the figure, you realize that it is a skeleton sitting on a throne.
^Leave The Cave To Share This Find With Your Colleagues!
